Uses of Class
org.opensocial.data.OpenSocialPerson

Packages that use OpenSocialPerson
org.opensocial.client   
 

Uses of OpenSocialPerson in org.opensocial.client
 

Methods in org.opensocial.client that return OpenSocialPerson
 OpenSocialPerson OpenSocialClient.fetchPerson(java.lang.String userId)
          Requests a user's profile details and returns an OpenSocialPerson instance with all of the relevant information.
static OpenSocialPerson OpenSocialJsonParser.parsePersonEntry(java.lang.String in)
          Transforms a raw JSON string containing profile information for a single user into an OpenSocialPerson instance with all profile details abstracted as OpenSocialField objects associated with the instance.
 

Methods in org.opensocial.client that return types with arguments of type OpenSocialPerson
 java.util.Collection<OpenSocialPerson> OpenSocialClient.fetchFriends(java.lang.String userId)
          Requests the friend list and profile information for a user and returns a Java Collection of OpenSocialPerson instances representing the friends.
static java.util.Collection<OpenSocialPerson> OpenSocialJsonParser.parsePersonCollection(java.lang.String in)
          Transforms a raw JSON string containing profile information for a group of users into a group of OpenSocialPerson instances with all profile details abstracted as OpenSocialField objects associated with the instance.
